data.short_description: HypeSquad application doesn't exit when switching accounts.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to  - Click on "Apply now" (Make sure it doesn't say "log in to apply". - Next to "Hi Hole" (since my user is Hole), you should see a log out button. Press it. - Then, log into your account again. After logging on, you should be redirected to the screen where you have the choice to choose Coordinator or Attendee. - Press X on top right corner of that screen to exit hypesquad application out.
